channel.title: CVE Feed for Scriptcase -- Scriptcase
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Scriptcase -- Scriptcase

item.title: CVE-2024-8940|2024-09-24T11:48:36.160Z -- scriptcase -- scriptcase
item.description: Vulnerability in the Scriptcase application version 9.4.019, which involves the arbitrary upload of a file via /scriptcase/devel/lib/third/jquery_plugin/jQuery-File-Upload/server/php/ via a POST request. An attacker could upload malicious files to the server due to the application not properly verifying user input.

item.title: CVE-2024-8941|2024-09-24T11:50:58.074Z -- scriptcase -- scriptcase
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Scriptcase version 9.4.019, in /scriptcase/devel/compat/nm_edit_php_edit.php (in the “subpage” parameter), which allows unauthenticated remote users to bypass SecurityManager's intended restrictions and list and/or read a parent directory via a “/...” or directly into a path used in the POST parameter “field_file” by a web application.

item.title: CVE-2024-8942|2024-09-24T11:51:49.722Z -- scriptcase -- scriptcase
item.description: Vulnerability in Scriptcase version 9.4.019 that consists of a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), due to the lack of input validation, affecting the “id_form_msg_title” parameter, among others. This vulnerability could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted URL to a victim and retrieve their credentials.
